## Form.setListOfValues() method

Set the LOV for the given block, field or fields

**Signature:**

```typescript
setListOfValues(lov: ListOfValues | Class<ListOfValues>, block: string, field: string | string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  lov | [ListOfValues](./forms42core.listofvalues.md) \| [Class](./forms42core.class.md)<!-- -->&lt;[ListOfValues](./forms42core.listofvalues.md)<!-- -->&gt; | The List of Values (LOV) or its class. |
|  block | string | The block associated with the LOV. |
|  field | string \| string\[\] | The field associated with the LOV, or an array of fields. |

**Returns:**

void
